org.reroutlab.code.auav.drivers

Class ExternalCommandsDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.reroutlab.code.auav.drivers.AuavDrivers
      • org.reroutlab.code.auav.drivers.ExternalCommandsDriver

  • public class ExternalCommandsDriver
extends AuavDrivers
    This driver forwards commands from a network source to any other driver. It also supports a "list" command that tells of all available modules. This driver runs on port 5117.
    URL: coap:\\localhost:port\cr?
    Example: coap:\\127.0.0.1:5117\cr?dn=org.reroutlab.code.auav.drivers.DroneGimbalDriver-dc=pos
    Note: all AUAV drivers have resource component "cr" for coap resource
    Since:
    2017-05-01
